dict_result.element_description: The 'Continue with email' button in the sign-in modal

description.thought: The user has navigated to the sign-in modal on TV Guide's website. In order to proceed with adding 'The Wire' to the watchlist, the user needs to sign in. Given the available options, continuing with an email appears to be a straightforward choice for many users who may not prefer social sign-in options like Facebook. Therefore, it would be appropriate to click the 'Continue with email' button to proceed with the email sign-in process.

dict_result.element_description: '+ Watchlist' button next to the show title

description.thought: The user is now on the specific page for 'The Wire' on the TV Guide website. The next step is to add the show to the watchlist. There is a '+ Watchlist' button visible next to the title of the show, which is intended for this purpose. Clicking this button will add 'The Wire' to the user's watchlist.
description.action: Clicking the '+ Watchlist' button on the show's page to add 'The Wire' to the user's watchlist on TV Guide.
